name: JellyBridge
description: Bridge Jellyfin with Jellyseerr for seamless show discovery and download requests

versions.changelog: Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.4 - Added FavoriteEventHandler service to subscribe to favorite item events in Jellyfin. The service listens for UserDataSaved events and can trigger custom logic when items are favorited or unfavorited. This enables real-time processing of favorite changes instead of relying solely on scheduled sync tasks.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.4 - Added FavoriteEventHandler service to subscribe to favorite item events in Jellyfin. The service listens for UserDataSaved events and can trigger custom logic when items are favorited or unfavorited. This enables real-time processing of favorite changes instead of relying solely on scheduled sync tasks.
Jellyfin 10.11.0: v2.1.1 - Changed parameters in library refresh to limit metadata provider updates and improved error logging for discover API calls
Jellyfin 10.10.7: v2.1.1 - Changed parameters in library refresh to limit metadata provider updates and improved error logging for discover API calls
Jellyfin 10.11.0: v2.1.0 - Fixed placeholder video creation for new installations. Improved automated library refresh for more consistency and only minimal required refresh options.
Jellyfin 10.10.7: v2.1.0 - Fixed placeholder video creation for new installations. Improved automated library refresh for more consistency and only minimal required refresh options.
Jellyfin 10.11.0: v2.0.1 - Updated configuration page: added comment to Watch Region select element and removed v2.0.1 entries from manifest after deleting GitHub release.
Jellyfin 10.10.7: v2.0.1 - Updated configuration page: added comment to Watch Region select element and removed v2.0.1 entries from manifest after deleting GitHub release.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v2.0.0 - Major: Renamed configuration setting labels and synchronized README/UI. Merged feature into main excluding manifest and cleaned artifacts to match manifest. Updated screenshots and docs for the new configuration layout.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v2.0.0 - Major: Renamed configuration setting labels and synchronized README/UI. Merged feature into main excluding manifest and cleaned artifacts to match manifest. Updated screenshots and docs for the new configuration layout.

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.3 - Fixed ArgumentException when duplicate JellyfinUserGuid values exist in Jellyseerr users: Added duplicate filtering logic to GetJellyseerrUsersAsync method to filter out duplicate JellyfinUserGuid values, keeping only the first occurrence and logging warnings when duplicates are found. This prevents errors when creating the user lookup dictionary in EnsureJellyseerrUser.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.3 - Fixed ArgumentException when duplicate JellyfinUserGuid values exist in Jellyseerr users: Added duplicate filtering logic to GetJellyseerrUsersAsync method to filter out duplicate JellyfinUserGuid values, keeping only the first occurrence and logging warnings when duplicates are found. This prevents errors when creating the user lookup dictionary in EnsureJellyseerrUser.
Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.2 - Added a note about functional issues with Create separate libraries for streaming services option
Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.2 - Added a note about functional issues with Create separate libraries for streaming services option

Jellyfin 10.11.0: v1.3.0 - Minor release: UI refinements (Favorite Settings section; Library Directory moved to General; Enable Plugin and Sync Interval positioned above Test Connection; dependent controls disabled when plugin disabled). Reset flow restores default networks. Backend supports NetworkMap=null to reset. README/screenshots updated to match UI.

Jellyfin 10.10.7: v1.3.0 - Minor release: UI refinements (Favorite Settings section; Library Directory moved to General; Enable Plugin and Sync Interval positioned above Test Connection; dependent controls disabled when plugin disabled). Reset flow restores default networks. Backend supports NetworkMap=null to reset. README/screenshots updated to match UI.
